website_summaries.verdict: A quality Lego set that is simple to assemble and provides hours of fun.
pros: 125 piece set is easy to assemble
Spider legs and scorpion pincers on each car can move
Includes Spider-Man and one popular villain
Pieces are compatible with other Lego sets as well
cons: Kids under 4 may need assistance with set up

website_summaries.verdict: Considering its feature-packed bug-themed cars, classic comic characters, and how simple this set is to assemble, it’s the best LEGO set a young Spider-Man fan could ask for.
pros: Build Spider-Man and Scorpion’s mini-cars, and city alley
Larger pieces are easy to assemble
cons: The cars are way more fun than the alley pieces

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids, hours of creativity.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons 4th birthday. I built it for him because it was a little complicated for him, but after words he took some legos apart and made his own creations. It was wonderful to see his imagination with these. He was so excited. He played with it literly for hours. From 6pm to 12 pm when he finally fell asleep with it next to him.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin&Island

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 6 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 6 year old and he LOVED it. He was so excited and exclaimed "it's easy to build!!" :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bribery ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a 4 year old who needs to be bribed to act like a normal human being, I highly recommend these Legos! We set up a rewards chart and after 10 good days, he got his reward! Now, of course, he says they're boring and he doesn't want to play with them, but we know he'll come back to them. They always do.
customer_reviews.author: Chaviva GB

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for my child
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty awesome experience to build. I have a special needs son that has mobility and fine motor skills disabilities. This was a great experience being able to build this with him, and he was able to do a good portion of it on him own.
customer_reviews.author: luken

customer_reviews.title: Love the Juniors!
customer_reviews.text: LEGO Juniors are the bridge from Duplo to regular Legos that start at 5yrs. They were perfect for a 4 yr old who was finished with his Duplos & loved the tiny Superhero characters. There wasn’t a lot of pieces for his shorter attention span.
customer_reviews.author: Christian King

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I helped my 4 yr old grandson put this together on Christmas Day. His parents were thrilled that it took us two hours...he was better than I but a little assistance in looking at the shapes and ways that pieces fit made it fun for me too.
customer_reviews.author: Book Nut

customer_reviews.title: Simple kit for kids
customer_reviews.text: Super simple Spider-Man kit for kids. It’s not a challenging build for adults, but it’s a good set to round out the rest of the Spider-Man sets for older builders since Scorpion isn’t included in the bigger sets.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bjuland

customer_reviews.title: lego is always perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Just what my grandson wanted for his 5th birthday. Was cheaper by pennies than box store, and it was quarantine time so I did not have to go out shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Son loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is getting into legos and they can be very expensive. This set was perfect for our first venture and now we have several sets put together. It is great bonding time for us and learning for him. Great gift for a 4 year old!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my 6 year old for his birthday. He loved this. He did need a little bit of help to assemble it, but was able to do the majority of it by himself. Fantastic set.
customer_reviews.author: John Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too difficult for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I would recommend for an older child. I had to build the entire thing for my 4 year old nephew. He did enjoy playing with the finished product but many parts came off which became necessary for me to continue to put it all back together.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great into to legos
customer_reviews.text: This set is small which is perfect to introduce a 4 year old to legos. I would say that the age recommendation is spot on. Outside of that, these are legos so the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Gift item
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves Lego's and these smaller kits work perfectly. He can play with Lego's like his older brother but also doesn't get frustrated with a larger kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for 4 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift, so no direct use of it. But my nephew likes his birthday gift a lot, so that is why it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: rhynocerology

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Any toy that keeps my four year old grandson happy for an extended period deserves 5*’s. I admit I enjoyed putting this together with him.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Wardrop

customer_reviews.title: Super Hero and Villian LEGO Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a little boy turning four years old. Getting interested in super heroes and LEGO products. The bright colors, size of the super hero and villain figures plus the composition of the other play pieces were a big hit with the birthday boy and his parents. Looking forward to purchasing more LEGO products for him.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Good Set but Too Many Pieces
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great set, but in my opinion it’s way too many pieces for a 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Great and compact
customer_reviews.text: A small box with a lot of fun. This was a gift for my nephew and he loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Gerena

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift or birthday
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for 5 years old and up will need help with a parent
customer_reviews.author: Tonianne

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yo loved putting this together with me by his side. He only needed a few corrections and refocusing on the instructions; mostly directional placement.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel U

customer_reviews.title: My 4yr old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old did it mostly by himself following the given instruction book with little assistance. And, if it comes apart, he's now able to put it together without help. This was his first lego puzzle following the instructions and we were very pleased that the instructions were clear enough for him to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for superhero fans
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo grandson loves Spiderman k was excited to see he could build him with Legos.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Frey Theunissen

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old Grandson loves LEGO time with his dad.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. 4 year old Grandson loves LEGO time with his dad.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Nagelin

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. It was a gift for a three year old and he just loves the spidey car!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin & Karin

customer_reviews.title: Rough trip
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but the box is not acceptable. I don't know what happened on the way here but it must have been a rough trip. Good thing this is going to my child otherwise I wouldn't be able to give this gift to someone else's child.
customer_reviews.author: Holly R

customer_reviews.title: Spidey!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller parts than I would have thought for a 4 year old set but easy to put together and fun
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good set.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old enjoys this set. Dad had to help a little but he’s going good on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: These are the very small lego pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great Lego set as usual, however, with a few exceptions - such as the car - these parts are the smallest Legos so your younger child will likely need help.
customer_reviews.author: D  Delacoeur

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I kids loved it! The older one - six - tried to put the cars together herself and I felt bad taking them apart to put them together the right way.

customer_reviews.title: It's Legos!
customer_reviews.text: It's Legos! Easy for my 6 year old to put together himself. Loved the characters.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Perrin

customer_reviews.title: fun product!
customer_reviews.text: my kids loved it..wish it was a little cheaper since we buy so much of LEGOS or if LEGOS could have a rewards program!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bub-bub

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Assembled this with my 3 year old. I’m not usual the LEGO type. This was easy. Not so much to assemble. And he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 5 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 5 year old birthday present. He loves it! Can build Legos and play with his favorite guys.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift

customer_reviews.title: My 4-year-old nephew loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit with my nephew who's turning four. He loves it so much! It felt like you got a lot for your money considering the price!

customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a Christmas gift. I am certain that it was enjoyed! I was so happy that It arrived quickly - that was important. I will be certain to consider Amazon Prime in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Nuc

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved this logo set!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Lego Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift and my nephew loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this LEGO is worth 40 some dollars. It’s not hard to put together but the pieces fall off when my grandson plays with it. He’s not rough with it either. Don’t buy this Spider-Man LEGO. It’s not worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My son received this for his 4th birthday. He was able to assemble the Legos by himself with little guidance. He like to take it apart and put it back together again when he wants to play with them again.

customer_reviews.text: These Lego Juniors are great. This is my 5 year old son's 3rd or 4th set and he puts them together pretty much all by himself. He loves them. The Spiderman and Batman ones are his favorite.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: It was stolen from my daughter's doorstep
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was okay, but there's no way of really knowing, because I had it delivered to my daughter's house for our grandson, but apparently somebody stole it, as they could not find it. Lesson learned. I will have it delivered to a pickup location in the future, so nobody can steal it.

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Legos

product_meta.title: LEGO Juniors/4+ Marvel Super Heroes Spider-Man vs. Scorpion Street Showdown 10754 Building Kit (125 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Buckle up and join Spider-Man in this high-speed LEGO Juniors/4+ 10754 Spider-Man vs. Scorpion Street Showdown set, as he chases after the Scorpion in his Easy to Build Spidey-car with movable spider legs. This super hero toy starter set also features a Scorpion vehicle with movable pincers and tail, plus an alley wall with opening window, ramp that connects 2 ways, big web, flexible web ‘string’ and a buildable catapult. This fun Spider-Man toy also includes a simple guide to build and play, with bigger starter pieces to help build confidence in younger children. Includes 2 minifigures.
feature_bullets: Build an alley wall with rooftop, opening window and connection spots for web elements, a Spidey-car with movable legs and a Scorpion vehicle with movable pincers and tail

Alley measures over 4 inches (12cm) high, 3 inches (8cm) wide and 2 inches (6cm) deep Spidey-car measures over 1 inches (3cm) high, 3 inches (9cm) long and 2 inches (7cm) wide Scorpion car with tail raised measures over 3 inches (9cm) high, 4 inches (11cm) long and 2 inches (7cm) wide
125 pieces – Easy to Build starter set super hero toy for boys and girls between the ages of 4 and 7

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars675 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
